bookTitle: Putting the One Minute Manager to Work: How to Turn the 3 Secrets into Skills
Plot: The second book in this record-breaking series, Putting the One Minute Manager to Work , turns the three secrets of One Minute Management into day-to-day skills and shows how they work in real-life situations. By going straight to boardrooms and assembly lines for their examples, the authors put the One Minute concepts into working systems that directly affect a company's bottom line. Here is the next step in the revolutionary, simple, and uniquely effective system that is changing how the world runs business.
